original_text: So the Levites and all Judah did according to all things that Jehoiada the priest had commanded, and took every man his men that were to come in on the sabbath, with them that were to go out on the sabbath: for Jehoiada the priest dismissed not the courses.
korean_text: 레위 사람들과 모든 유다 사람들이 제사장 여호야다가 명령한 모든 것을 준행하여 각기 수하에 안식일에 당번인 자와 안식일에 비번인 자들을 거느리고 있었으니 이는 제사장 여호야다가 비번인 자들을 보내지 아니함이더라

sentences.original_text: So the Levites and all Judah did
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 레위 사람들과 유다 모든 백성이 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: according to all things that Jehoiada the priest had commanded
and took every man his men that were to come in on the sabbath
with them that were to go out on the sabbath:
for Jehoiada the priest dismissed not the courses.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 제사장 여호야다가 반차를 파하지 아니하였음이더라
